page.title: 01JERRY CLAY LANE SAY HELLO
page.content: The pupils at Jerry Clay Lane School (class five only) would like to welcome you to The Domesday Project 1986 .These are some of the things we have written about;THE NEW VILLAGE HALL,GIRLS BRIGADE , THE NEW PILOTS CLUB, GARDENERS WORLD, SILCOATES SUMMER SCHOOL , THE BROWNIES, MAY DAY SPECTACULAR, PROVINCIAL DAY, TV AND MRS ELMY and lots more too.At Jerry Clay Lane the areas that we are covering,are Wrenthorpe and Alverthorpe, Ossett and Wakefield. Jerry Clay Lane School is nine years old, but some other schools in the area are a lot older. Pear Tree Cottage is one of the oldest houses in the area (it is two hundred years old) and that too is in our project. The pupils at Jerry Clay Lane have each done their part in the Domesday Project.
